mapper.select: select id as id, task_id as taskId, user_id as userId, pub_confirm_status as pubConfirmStatus, pub_confirm_time as pubConfirmTime, app_confirm_status as appConfirmStatus, app_confirm_time as appConfirmTime, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime, version as version, is_active as isActive from t_weixin_task_apply where task_id = #{query.taskId}
